channel.title: Read this if your a first time poster in the server development section
channel.description:
[b]This tutorial will help you not be a noob in the server development section:[/b]
[ul][li] If you know nothing about java that is okay but if your not willing to learn and want others to do it for you this is NOT for you[/li]
[li]Do not post things like i want complete source or all of 1 thing their is noone that will give it too you[/li]
[li]This is not a work free enviroment things require trial and error and you will get mad sometimes [/li]
[li]Contributing is good for the community but if its not yours leave credit if you dont know who wrote is post something like i didnt write this[/li]
[li]topic titles are importing things like "i need help" are not specific "[tag]" indicators are great way of seperating your posts expessially if you post alot![/li]
[li]No person is stupid but their is stupid questions dont get mad if your called a noob we all been their![/li]
[li]Use the search button he is your friend and gives free candy![/li]
[li]and for the love of god do not post about javac errors their is plenty of tutorials on how to fix these allready just use your search button![/li]
[li]Also remember the way you act on these forums is important if you act like an ASS your gonna be targeted as one we all have bad days but you dont bring your lifes story here we all have are own and dont care about yours[/li]
[li]This isnt a antileech community but if you choose to be a leech dont expect instant response your still frowned apon :p[/li][/ul]

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

This tutorial will help you not be a noob in the server development section:

[ul][li]
If you know nothing about java that is okay but if your not willing to learn and want others to do it for you this is NOT for you[/li]

[li]Do not post things like i want complete source or all of 1 thing their is noone that will give it too you[/li]

[li]This is not a work free enviroment things require trial and error and you will get mad sometimes [/li]

[li]Contributing is good for the community but if its not yours leave credit if you dont know who wrote is post something like i didnt write this[/li]

[li]topic titles are importing things like “i need help” are not specific “[tag]” indicators are great way of seperating your posts expessially if you post alot![/li]

[li]No person is stupid but their is stupid questions dont get mad if your called a noob we all been their![/li]

[li]Use the search button he is your friend and gives free candy![/li]

[li]and for the love of god do not post about javac errors their is plenty of tutorials on how to fix these allready just use your search button![/li]

[li]Also remember the way you act on these forums is important if you act like an ASS your gonna be targeted as one we all have bad days but you dont bring your lifes story here we all have are own and dont care about yours[/li]

[li]This isnt a antileech community but if you choose to be a leech dont expect instant response your still frowned apon :p[/li][/ul]
